author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
investigating deviceguard failure.  only failing on AppVeyor.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body:
The DeviceGuard test is still failing:
```
[-] Test for DeviceGuard properties 107ms
   Expected {0} to be greater than {0}
   at line: 1392 in C:\projects\powershell\test\powershell\Modules\Microsoft.PowerShell.Management\Get-ComputerInfo.Tests.ps1
   1392:                     $observed.DeviceGuardRequiredSecurityProperties.Count | Should BeGreaterThan 0
```

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: If this is the only failure blocking daily builds, should we mark this test as pending on Windows, till we figure out the root cause. We have not had a successful daily build in about 19 days.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @adityapatwardhan good idea, I'll submit that as a different PR so I can keep investigating this

title: Fix deviceguard test failure
